other_tests.findings: Epidermal inclusion cyst presented with swelling over left arm, located under the scar of a previous Bacillus Calmette-Gu√©rin injection site.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The lesion increased in size and became erythematous over the previous 3 weeks.

other_tests.findings: Multiple venous anastomoses thrombosed; initial removal of clot from internal jugular vein.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Despite reanastomosis, flap ultimately failed 18 hours post-operation.

other_tests.findings: Patient had a G20210A mutation indicative of an inherited hypercoagulable state.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Presented with repeated venous thrombosis during flap reconstruction.
